#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=UN observers in Syria fired upon as report alleges US warplanes readying attack
#Text=Wednesday , August 28 , 2013
#Text=On Monday , the convoy used by a United Nations ( UN ) investigation team while gathering evidence of an alleged chemical weapons attack in Syria of August 21 , was fired upon by snipers .
#Text=No injuries were reported in the attack , but the UN says at least one vehicle was destroyed and several were shot at .
#Text=It 's not clear whether rebels or the Syrian army were responsible for the attack .
#Text=The team left the scene and returned at a later time with a new vehicle .

#Text=" What I am told is that despite the very difficult circumstances , our team replaced their car and returned to the suburbs of Damascus to carry out their investigation , " said UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon in a statement on Monday .

#Text=Both the rebels and Syrian government are said to have been granted " safe " passage while performing their investigation which has to be completed in 14 days , not including any possible extensions .
#Text=The team arrived on August 18 and is investigating the scene of an alleged chemical weapons attack that occurred on August 21 in the Ghouta suburb of Damascus .
#Text=Reports say anywhere between 100 and 1,300 people were killed in the attack which is being blamed on government forces , something they deny .

#Text=" We hope that the results will clarify the issue and will help to dispel numerous speculations around the alleged use of the Syrian chemical weapons while simultaneously creating a positive background for the moves towards the start of the political process of settlement of the Syrian crisis , " Aleksandr Lukashevich , Russia 's foreign minister , said on August 22 .

column1: #Text=This is n't the first time a UN convoy has been targeted in Syria .

#Text=In May 2012 a convoy was hit by an Improvised Explosive Device ( IED ) while one of their human rights groups reported a Syrian military attack on civilians at a nearby funeral in the Syrian town of Khan Sheikhoun in Idlib province .
#Text=Three Marked UN vehicles were damaged in the attack but no one was injured .
#Text=The latest attack on the UN comes as a US government official called their current investigation " too late to be credible .

#Text=The United States ( U.S. ) says the attacks are  corrupting " any evidence the team might have come in contact with .

column1: #Text=Two reports by the British newspaper The Guardian suggest the U.S. might not wait for the team to finish their investigation .
#Text=According to the reports , U.S. transport planes have been arriving within 100 miles of Syria in Cyprus .
#Text=The Guardian cites sources which say U.S. Forces are " ready to go " in the event a strike on Syria is ordered .

#Text=" We are prepared , we have moved assets in place to be able to fulfil and comply with whatever option the president wishes to take , if he wishes to take any of the options he 's asked for , " said U.S. Secretary of Defense Chuck Hagel on Tuesday .
#Text=According to the newspaper 's report , commercial airline pilots claim to have observed C-130 transport planes visually and fighter jet formations by radar .
#Text=The newspaper also claims residents say military activity has been increased .
#Text=According to Wikileaks , the whistle blowing website , a document shows the U.S. would use Cyprus as the main base of operations to launch an airstrike against Syria .
#Text=The document is part of a 2012 leak labeled the " Global Intelligence Files " which consists of emails from within the global intelligence firm Stratfor .
